html:
2.28.19  11:19 pm   I like the 1 train but it's broken. Do I replace with evil slow C train?

     the train is not broken. the person who got hit by it is broken

2.28.19  11:18 pm   How do I have a conversation with a person?

     for another reason. if there is no other reason, then ask them who they are. if you already know who they are, tell them who you are. if they also already know who you are, ask them how they are. they probably will tell you a simple fake version instead of the whole story. then they will ask you how you are and you will also tell them a mostly fake version of the real story. then start asking each other where you are and what is going on here, and collaborate on finding answers to that question. if and when you find those answers, then you can start asking what may happen next

2.28.19  11:10 pm   How do I be less sensitive and care less about what other people say about me?

     start caring more about what you say about them

      Whenever someone says anything even a little bit negative about me, I can't get it out of my head.

     focus on what you are going to say to them

2.28.19  11:07 pm   Would a dream about the y-axis be considered a nightmare?

     it all depends what happens there

2.28.19  10:10 pm   do you wear your baseball caps mildly sideways for aesthetic purposes, or is it just more comfortable that way?

     it is mostly to avoid the attrocious aesthetic of it being in any other direction. also in the wind it is important to be more diagonal because it's tighter that way

2.28.19  10:00 pm   Do you sometimes get suicidal?

     that's a personal question but no

2.28.19  7:07 pm   Hey, why don't you allow people to make subtitles for your videos? That way people from all over the world will be able to understand them! 

     i disagree. i think the only way someone in another native language would be able to properly understand would be if i were to do a thorough re-write, with the help of a great writer in that language, and/or translator, including a lot of trust building to ensure that all the material is hitting the same way and properly adapted to sit comfortably in that language. then do a re-casting and re-recording of the vocal (the casting process would be an additional process which was never done in the first place because it was be me by default), then re-editing all the graphics, translating them and also adjusting the entire thing for time, and surely some content adjustments as well, due to new script. re-writing nearly all the jingles/vocal music entirely. recording the new music. and finally rescoring the underscore music. this would be a wonderful project to take on, but given the large amount of future projects to be done, it is simply not a priority to do alternate versions of previous projects

2.28.19  6:00 pm   do you think you will ever get to take a break from youtubing?

     i have never gone youtubing

2.28.19  5:18 pm   I'm amazed by how many questions on this page contain misspellings. They're pretty bad ones, too. Are you appalled by how illiterate your fans are? 

     no

2.28.19  5:02 pm   Are you screwing your schedule again?

     it got screwed in early december. nearly against my will

     It's been 2 weeks already

     it's currently supposed to be a 1 + 1 week schedule

     STOP F&CKING YOUR SCHEDULE

     i have yet to physically prove capability of hitting this schedule, and the previous schedule had no non-song content

     -AC

     approximately 2 cats

2.28.19  1:24 pm   did you make wfaoie because of the leftover information from researching for history of the enitre world?

     no

2.28.19  12:56 pm   can you explain your process on how to sidechain?

     i know almost nothing about it, and i never touched it until very recently. i don't really know what you can do with it but so far i am just using it for reverb/delay on the vocal. you put a compressor on the rev/delay track, and side chain it to the lead vocal. this makes the reverb/delay get out of the way of the lead vocal at the moment it's being sung, and then the rev/delay comes in after. it clears things up because now you're not hearing the vocal and the reverb on top of each other

2.28.19  12:08 pm   i feel like you might have a lot of fun with a guitar and pedalboard full of wacky and wild effects

     that may be true

2.28.19  11:40 am   hey so what about microtonality?

     tones can be any size

      as far as i remember you have written stuff about how you prefer 12-TET but systems such 19-TET are also pretty exciting, too me at least. Heck, even quartertones can sometimes be cool. have you ever written stuff outside of 12-TET?

     yes

     it's good

And some of them I can't implement at all right now, for logistics reasons. How can I hold on and keep doing what I need to do, while necessarily feeling like shit for a while?

     tell a story, or make a reality show, about your struggles. stories are actually better when there's struggles

2.27.19  4:16 pm   i'm so tired ALL THE TIME how do i stay awake when sleep is so good, i'm so idk, bored by life? my friends and family are just a snooze fest, i'm more of an "experience the world let's go to a museum or something" person and my friends want to spend ALL THEIR TIME online or listening to music/movies and i learn by actually doing stuff for myself and using my senses idk i'm just BORED help. i'd go on my own to places but i'm... anxious and don't wanna look like a fucking loser rip me

     where is the nearest accessible place you've never been
